name: TamaQuest
description:
This is a fangame and submission entry for Puzzle and Dragon's 4th Anniversary Contest! Beat up some Blood Devils and gain plus eggs to upgrade your Odin Tama.

Please enjoy! This is the first game that my friend and I ever collaborated on (and also our first time with pixel art and GameMaker). We had a lot of plans we couldn't fulfill in the allotted time, so please, PLEASE let us know if you have interest in more development.

All characters depicted are owned by GungHo, and this project will not be monetized.

Programming: Anthony Rodriguez

Art: Lily Nghi

Left and Right to Move

Up to Jump

Space to Attack

alsodontwalkleftatthebeginning:^)
